name: Balloon Boy Adventures
description:
Collect the 5 stars and restore peace to the land!

Controls

KeyboardControllerMoveArrow keysDpadJumpXBGlideZAQuit gameEscSelectChoose (in menus)ZStartPause (ingame)SpaceStart

Note: Exit menu button may not work in the browser.

Fonts used:

04b_30 https://www.dafont.com/04b-30.font

G.B.Boot https://www.dafont.com/gb-boot.font

Early Gameboy https://www.dafont.com/early-gameboy.font
